subject: Re: [junit] SOAP and JUnit
msgSnippet: it may be your classpath. often the xml classes a bundled together in many different jars, like soap and junit. often these jars are sealed meaning once you
messageBody:
Re: [junit] SOAP and JUnit

it may be your classpath. often the xml classes a bundled together in many different jars, like soap and junit. often these jars are 'sealed' meaning once you loaded a class from one jar, all other classes from this package must be loaded from this jar.
you should order your classpath to have the xml package first, for example
classpath=jaxp.jar;xalan.jar;crimson.jar;soap.jar;junit.jar

TH Lim wrote:

    Hi,

    I am developed a Apahce SOAP 2.2 client and testing it with JUnit 3.7. If I
    run the test code alone, it is fine but if I run the test code under JUnit
    I get the exception included below. From what I see I think it has to  with
    java permission so I set the security policy call to no permission (allows
    ALL). Yet, I still get the same exception. Is it some setting I need to do
    to JUnit or others classes that involved. Please advise. thank you.

    java.lang.LinkageError: Class org/xml/sax/InputSource violates loader
    constraints
            at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass0(Native Method)
            at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.jaa:486)
            at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(SecureClassLoader.java:111)
            at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(URLClassLoader.java:248)
            at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(URLClassLoader.java:56)
            at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:195)
            at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
            at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
            at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:297)
            at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:286)
            at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:253)
            at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:313)
            at
    org.apache.xerces.readers.DefaultEntityHandler.startReadingFromDocument(DefaultEntityHandler.java:484)
            at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLParser.parseSomeSetup(XMLParser.java:304)
            at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLParser.parse(XMLParser.java:907)
            at
    org.apache.xerces.jaxp.DocumentBuilderImpl.parse(DocumentBuilderImpl.java:123)
            at org.apache.soap.rpc.Call.invoke(Call.java:216)
            at com.jh.epos.admin.client.SOAPFactory.invoke(SOAPFactory.java:105)
            at $Proxy0.login(Unknown Source)
            at
    test.com.jh.epos.admin.server.TestServerLogin.testFactoryConnection(TestServerLogin.java:55)
